thread.title: Mother of Bonds' baby on what to expect if your child wins
thread.title_full: Mother of Bonds' baby on what to expect if your child wins

title: Mother of Bonds' baby on what to expect if your child wins
text: 'Vent inwards, celebrate outwards, ignore the haters and don't feel you have to do every TV spot': Mother of Bonds' baby winner on what to expect if YOUR child takes this year's title Kat Abianac's son, Parker Myles, won the People's Choice in Baby Bonds in 2016 The mother of the adorable little boy has since written an open letter In the letter, Ms Abianac talks about what to expect if your child wins the comp She said it's important to ignore the comments on the Internet She also said you don't have to do every TV spot and should vent inwards Ms Abianac's son who has Down syndrome has nearly 24,000 fans on Facebook
